name: Hybrid Rift-Runner Sloop
prompt:
# TTRPG Asset Generation Prompt

## Core Structure
[Asset Type: vehicle]
[Game System: D&D 5e]
[Intended Use: VTT and Print reference]

## Detailed Description
Subject: Blueprint cutaway — Hybrid Rift-Runner Sloop
Environment: plan views and cross-sections (top/side/decks)
Style: heroic tabletop fantasy (D&D 5e adjacent), unified painterly collection style, grounded medieval-fantasy materials, culturally coherent gear, no modern tech or signage, clean blueprint, numbered pins for callouts
Technical Requirements: aspect 1:1, resolution 1024x1024
Palette: indigos, violets, black, cold silver


## Visual Specifications
- Lighting: studio
- Detail Level: high detail for zoom, simplified for overview
- Composition: rule of thirds with clear focal points and visual flow

## Practical Considerations
- Must be readable at intended viewing size
- Use numbered callout pins (01, 02, 03…) instead of long text annotations. Include a clean legend area without rendering complex paragraphs.
- Avoid embedded text unless specified; prefer iconography and numbered pins

## Negatives
- nonsense text, watermarks, captions, signatures, artist names; modern signage, photoreal CGI, anime style, bloom glare; overly sexualized or glamorized portrayal

Think deeply about creating an asset that enhances gameplay immersion while maintaining practical usability for TTRPG sessions.
alt_text: Blueprint cutaway of Hybrid Rift-Runner Sloop.
callouts: numbered pins 01..10; legend area reserved; no paragraph labels
